channel.title: Kicksecure inside KVM/qemu,Linux mint HOST OS
channel.description:
hey I cant configure to get a network connection with KVM even tho It says I have a active connection and an ip but when starting the browser no internet at all... , When i run system check this error comes up
``` "ERROR: check network interfaces Result: No external network interface found.
Debugging information: Command ip -o addr show scope global did not show any output
If this error happens only during upgrading or is transient this error can be safely ignored. If you know what you are doing, feel free to disable this check. Create a file /etc/systemcheck.d/50_user.conf and add: "
And when i run systemctl this is what I get --
UNIT FILE STATE PRESET proc-sys-fs-binfmt_misc.automount static - -.mount generated - boot.mount generated - dev-hugepages.mount static - dev-mqueue.mount static - proc-sys-fs-binfmt_misc.mount disabled disabled sys-fs-fuse-connections.mount static - sys-kernel-config.mount static - sys-kernel-debug.mount static - sys-kernel-tracing.mount static - acpid.path enabled enabled systemd-ask-password-console.path static - systemd-ask-password-wall.path static - session-1.scope transient - accounts-daemon.service enabled enabled acpi-support.service enabled enabled acpid.service disabled enabled apparmor.service enabled enabled apt-daily-upgrade.service static - apt-daily.service static - autovt@.service alias - blk-availability.service enabled enabled bootclockrandomization.service enabled enabled canary.service enabled enabled console-getty.service disabled disabled console-setup.service enabled enabled container-getty@.service static - cryptdisks-early.service masked enabled cryptdisks.service masked enabled dbus-fi.w1.wpa_supplicant1.service alias - dbus-org.freedesktop.hostname1.service alias - dbus-org.freedesktop.locale1.service alias - item.title: Kicksecure inside KVM/qemu,Linux mint HOST OS
item.dc:creator: nolimit
item.description:
Hey I solved the problem with a guide but it took a couple of hours honestly, I created a bridge network setup and somehow it worked finally !

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Kicksecure inside KVM/qemu,Linux mint HOST OS

item.title: Kicksecure inside KVM/qemu,Linux mint HOST OS
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Which KVM libvirt XML file did you use?

Can be a KVM configuration issue on the host operating system.

Try running Debian or some other non-Kicksecure based operating system inside the VM - same issue?

Read full topic
item.source: Kicksecure inside KVM/qemu,Linux mint HOST OS

item.title: Kicksecure inside KVM/qemu,Linux mint HOST OS
item.dc:creator: nurmagoz
item.description:
kicksecure as ISO installed or the libvirt version?

Read full topic

item.description:
hey I cant configure to get a network connection with KVM even tho It says I have a active connection and an ip but when starting the browser no internet at allâ€¦ , When i run system check this error comes up

 "ERROR: check network interfaces Result: No external network interface found.

Debugging information:
Command
ip -o addr show scope global
did not show any output

If this error happens only during upgrading or is transient this error can be safely ignored. 
If you know what you are doing, feel free to disable this check. Create a file /etc/systemcheck.d/50_user.conf and add: "
